attributes.action: reduce the number of property programmes on TV and give us some entertainment!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Are you sick of programmes about buying and selling property constantly being shown on British TV? Do you agree that they are not representative of all the British people who are not property tycoons? Do you think that the programmes are completely boring???Sign here if you would like Ofcom to limit the number of property shows on TV and replace them with some *real* entertainment. (more Drama, Comedy etc. that Britain can be proud of)
